en: Beauford Delaney sketchbook from December 1961. Sketches include draft planning for assorted abstracts, a beach scene of people on the beach, a sketch entitled ‘Joyful Christmas’, and a landscape sketch of a mountain range in front of a lake with a sailboat on the water.
